General.Name: Kervan Gıda Sanayi Ve Ticaret As
General.Description: Kervan Gida Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. produces and sells candies in Turkey. The company provides jellies, licorices, marshmallows, lollipops, gums, and functional products. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1994 is based in Istanbul, Turkey.
